text_block_list.text:
It was summer training camp and Cesario was fired up. 
――At least as much as the sand under the scorching sun.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fuu…… 
Trainer, can I do one more?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
No. Not just one, more than that. 
I can still run.
choice_data_list: ……You have to consider fatigue. Last one.
……You have to consider fatigue. Last one.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Understood. 
Then, I'll complete the last one.

『She's too fired up』――it would probably be 
accurate to say that. She had more than enough 
passion, but that was turning in to impatience.
choice_data_list: (It was likely……due to the growth of her rivals)

text_block_list.text:
They had gradually been growing stronger during summer 
camp, and it was probably putting pressure on her.

It was natural for there to be a sense of rivalry. 
However, being impatient was counterproductive……
choice_data_list: (I need to get her to relax a little)

text_block_list.text:
Cesario had told me that her parents had taken her to see 
a comedy shortly after she had started pursuing her dream.

Now, it was my turn to step in, just like her parents, 
and help. As the one standing beside her as a 『Partner』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your guidance. ……I will definitely show 
results during this Summer Training Camp. Well then――
choice_data_list: Wait!……are you free after this?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes, are we having a meeting now? I'll prepare something 
to write with, so give me a little bit of time――
choice_data_list: No, there's something I want to show you

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……? Something you want to show me?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer? 
……How strange, this should be where we planned to meet――

I took a deep breath, I needed to switch 『On』. 
And then, I spoke.
choice_data_list: Aah～, just where am I going?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Eh? Trainer……?
choice_data_list: Did I go north instead of south for 3 days?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Is this perhaps……
choice_data_list: (Right, it's a comedy!)
(Right, it's a comedy!)

text_block_list.text:
If it was a comedy she liked, then maybe it would 
help her relax――with that in mind, I had tried to 
find a one-man play. I spent the night memorizing it.

Though, I had no experience acting. All I could 
really do was repeat the lines. Even then……
choice_data_list: That damn clown! Now he's made me the clown!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
choice_data_list: (W-what should I do……I messed up……!?)

text_block_list.text:
Was it hopeless for an amateur to truly entertain? 
I was starting to rush things. At that time――
choice_data_list: Ah, my foot……waaah!?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer!?
(Sliiiiiiiip!)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
A-are you okay!? 
You fell pretty hard on your butt……!!
choice_data_list: Oww……I-I'm fine――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Ah! Behind you! A wave!
choice_data_list: Hyaaaa, so cold～～～!?

text_block_list.text:
In a panic, I had tripped over my own feet, falling 
in to the water and then a wave washed over me.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Pfft.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer. Geez, are you okay?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I was surprised, but I'm fine!
Yeah, I was surprised, but I'm fine!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad……that you're not hurt…… 
But, was the thing you wanted to show me, this……?
choice_data_list: Well, for a change of pace……I guess?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
So that's why. 
Fufuu, s-sorry……
choice_data_list: This wasn't how I planned it though……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
No, but still. 
Um…………sorry, but it was really funny.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Just remembering Trainer's surprised face…… 
Ahaa……Fu fufufuu♪

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But still, it happened almost perfectly. Everything since 
I got here was almost like something out of a comedy!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
At the start, I was surprised and was wondering 
what was even happening though. Fufuu.
choice_data_list: I'm glad you're having fun!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahaa! ……Huu～～…… 
Yes, very much so!

The road to becoming a 『Guiding Light』 will be long and 
difficult. I could understand why she was in a hurry.

It wouldn't be a solo performance, there were so 
many main characters in this generation. She could 
be swept away in this sea's enraged and frothy jaws.
choice_data_list: You don't have to be impatient
You don't have to be impatient

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
――Yes. Kraft and the others are strong, 
tough, and have an overwhelming presence.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But, I have a presence that's even more important. 
I have a 『Partner』 like you.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's incredibly reassuring. 
I've felt that through all the days we've spent together.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That feeling will probably continue to grow even stronger. 
Just like today, my feelings of gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And that's why, there's no need for me to be 
impatient, is there? As long as I proceed steadily 
forward, then a path will definitely open.

Right. I was here to make Cesario the main character 
of this epic tale about the Triple Tiara. That's why――
choice_data_list: Cesario, I'll make you the leading role
Cesario, I'll make you the leading role

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I won't let anyone else have that role. 
――I have no intention of ever letting anyone take it.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And we'll achieve impressive victories, 
worthy of becoming that 『Guiding Light』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, with you as my 『Partner』, 
then I'm sure we'll accomplish that.
choice_data_list: Yeah. I won't let you down
Yeah. I won't let you down

text_block_list.text:
Even without saying it, we could feel each other's passion. And 
beyond that dream――we would see that boundless future together.
